original_title: 私を犯した大嫌いな男の、あの腰使いが忘れられなくて… 佐々木夏菜
overview: Coming from the countryside to Tokyo, Sakura, a member of the general affairs department, struggles to work for a company for the first time even though she is not used to it. Meanwhile, Sugiura, who has been appointed as the new branch manager, is full of sarcasm when he opens his mouth. He had a high-handed attitude and used people with his chin, and he was hated by the employees soon after taking office. Sakura, who was often called by Sugiura by extension, hated Sugiura without exception. Such Sugiura has a black rumor at the previous branch office.
title: The Man I Hate Who Ravaged Me. I’ll Never Forget How He Moved His Hips…Kana Sasaki
